main event: Numerous reports of unidentified flying objects were received from scattered places in Iran, including the Persian Gulf area, Tehran, Gorgon, and Tabriz.
interesting points: In the Tabriz area, there were several reports of 'flying saucers', and the recovery of one unit caused considerable excitement.
USAF MAAG officers identified the recovered object as a type of balloon used to drop 'Crusade for Freedom' leaflets.
Other reports from the Tabriz area, when investigated, indicated that other leaflet balloons had been seen and were the cause of numerous spectacular reports of unidentified flying objects.
No conclusive details could be obtained regarding the description, aerodynamic features, or other characteristics of the reported objects.
The descriptions given by observers indicated a 'free play of ideas of individual cases'.
